attributes.action: Urgent amendment's / review of the current british sentencing system in relation to serious crimes committed i.e. Murder
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Life should mean life!

Urgent review and changes required in the way that sentences are issued in relation to severe crimes.
Too many inconsistencies with sentencing.
Lack of human rights for families. 
No deterent for people committing crimes of such severe nature.
More consideration needs to be taken into account for victims families.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
